marketplaces.name: odta-sdlc-marketplace
marketplaces.description: Private marketplace for SDLC framework plugin testing

files.README.md:
# ODTA SDLC Private Plugin Marketplace

Private marketplace for SDLC framework plugin distribution and testing.

## Purpose

This marketplace hosts SDLC-related Claude Code plugins for:
- Testing plugin system mechanics
- Private distribution within organization
- Version management and updates
- Plugin discovery for team members

## Structure

```
claude-plugin-marketplace/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── marketplace.json     # Marketplace configuration
└── README.md                # This file
```

## Configuration

The marketplace is configured to use local file paths for testing:
- Plugins reference local directories during development
- Can be updated to use GitHub URLs for production distribution

## Available Plugins

### sdlc-test-plugin v0.1.0
Minimal test plugin to validate plugin system mechanics.
- **Source**: Local file path (E:\Development\claude-plugin-test)
- **Agents**: 1 (test-agent)
- **Purpose**: Validate plugin installation and agent loading

## Adding This Marketplace

### Local Testing (Current Setup)
```bash
claude plugins marketplace add E:\Development\claude-plugin-marketplace
```

### Production (After GitHub Push)
```bash
# Push this repo to GitHub first, then:
claude plugins marketplace add https://github.com/your-org/claude-plugin-marketplace
```

## Using Plugins from This Marketplace

```bash
# List available plugins
claude plugins list

# Install a plugin
claude plugins install sdlc-test-plugin

# Get plugin info
claude plugins info sdlc-test-plugin

# Update a plugin
claude plugins update sdlc-test-plugin

# Remove a plugin
claude plugins remove sdlc-test-plugin
```

## Adding New Plugins

Edit `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` and add a new entry:
```json
{
  "name": "plugin-name",
  "description": "Plugin description",
  "source": "E:\\Development\\plugin-directory",
  "version": "0.1.0"
}
```

## Future Plugins

As we validate the plugin system, this marketplace will grow to include:
- `sdlc-core` - Essential framework components
- `sdlc-development` - Development agents and workflows
- `sdlc-testing` - Testing agents and quality gates
- `sdlc-analysis` - Analysis and architecture agents
- `sdlc-enterprise` - Risk management and compliance features

## Related Issues

- Issue #226: Build Micro SDLC Plugin Test Harness
- Epic #210: Evaluate Claude Code Plugin System for Framework Distribution
